description_for_human: Sohbetten süt, kahvaltılık, peynir, tereyağı gibi ürünleri bulup sepete ekleyen ve ödemeyi bitiren PoC ajan.
description_for_model: Use this tool to fulfill natural-language commerce requests. Forward the user message verbatim to POST /agent/message. The backend will: 1) list merchants, 2) pick the most profitable one, 3) search products, 4) create cart, 5) add items, and 6) optionally checkout.
